solution_code: class Solution {--newline--    public:--newline--    void sortColors(vector<int>& nums) --newline--    {--newline--        int tmp = 0, low = 0, mid = 0, high = nums.size() - 1;--newline--    --newline--        while(mid <= high)--newline--        {--newline--            if(nums[mid] == 0)--newline--            {--newline--                tmp = nums[low];--newline--                nums[low] = nums[mid];--newline--                nums[mid] = tmp;--newline--                low++;--newline--                mid++;--newline--            }--newline--            else if(nums[mid] == 1)--newline--            {--newline--                mid++;--newline--            }--newline--            else if(nums[mid] == 2)--newline--            {--newline--                tmp = nums[high];--newline--                nums[high] = nums[mid];--newline--                nums[mid] = tmp;--newline--                high--;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--    }--newline--};
